name: Killer Tank
description:
This is a single adventure game. You can get diamonds by controlling tanks, killing enemies and completing many achievements. And use diamonds to unlock new tanks and upgrade tanks. If you like to play with your friends, there is also a double play mode, so that you and your partners can fight each other fairly. The better game experience is in the crazy tank.
1: Game provides 4 need to buy tanks and an original tank.
2: In the game, the tank can be upgraded to make the tank more powerful.
3: There are 24 maps, 20 levels and 4 chicken eating levels in the game.
4: You can choose double play mode and play with good friends to see who has more powerful operation.
5: Each level will randomly generate 5 super large tanks.
6: Each level randomly generates 5 combat resistant boss tanks (the more you fight, the bigger you get). You should seize the opportunity to kill them.
7: The last enemy at each level will become a super large boss.
8: In flight state, press K to adjust the viewing angle (keyboard), and move up and down to adjust the viewing angle (mouse).
9: In all scenarios, press the space to pause the game and choose to return to the main page or play again. P key to switch the perspective
10: : Escape kill game, want to kill the enemy, as long as the head hit it.
11: Bubble chaos fight small game, press the Z key can jump in place (when on the ground).
